summary: The module defines structures and utilities for automatically building and updating model cards for Sentence‑Transformer models. It provides a data class that gathers all required metadata (language, licensing, datasets, metrics, carbon‑emission info, etc.) and methods to validate, format, and serialize this information. A training callback integrates with the HuggingFace/Transformers training loop to collect training and evaluation details and produce a standardized model card. Helper functions expose simple generation and version‑retrieval capabilities.
business_intent: Enable developers and researchers to generate comprehensive, standards‑compliant model documentation for sentence‑transformer models with minimal manual effort, improving model transparency, reproducibility, and ease of publishing on model hubs.
